title: Kitting and Assembly
description: A customer orders a 'gift basket' product which is a kit made up of several individual items. A warehouse worker must assemble the kit.

tasks.description: Receive a work order to assemble a specific number of kits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the order to assemble 50 gift baskets.

tasks.description: Retrieve the bill of materials (BOM) for the kit, which lists all the component items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the list of all individual items needed for the gift basket.

tasks.description: Pick the required quantities of all component items from the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker gathers all the necessary components.

tasks.description: Assemble the components into the final kits and update the inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The worker assembles the 50 kits, and the agent updates the inventory, decreasing component stock and increasing the stock of the final kit product.
